amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for Rental Housing Assistance by $5 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Rental Housing Assistance by $5 million and to apply the savings to the Spending Reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A023) Failed by voice vote.
